message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,000. That's still a good price for you, considering the value of this product. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit too high on the budget. I can do $8,750, and that's as high as I'm willing to go.

Bob, I really appreciate your persistence, but $8,750 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,250.  That's a fair price for both of us, and it allows me to stay closer to my target value. Let's get this deal done!
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I can do $8,900, and that's as high as I'm willing to go. Please consider it.
